sqlMap.select: SELECT SUBSTR(sys_connect_by_path(A.NAME, ' ->'), 4) AS ITEMNAME, ITEMID, ITEMPID, PRICE, LVL, (SELECT COUNT(ITEMPID) FROM TCE_ITEM WHERE A.ITEMID = ITEMPID AND OLDYN = 'N') CNT FROM TCE_ITEM A WHERE A.OLDYN = 'N' START WITH (ITEMPID = 0) CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEMID = ITEMPID ORDER SIBLINGS BY orderby

SELECT ITEMNAME, ITEMID, ITEMPID, PRICE, LVL FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR(sys_connect_by_path(A.NAME, ' ->'), 4) AS ITEMNAME, ITEMID, ITEMPID, PRICE, LVL, (SELECT COUNT(ITEMPID) FROM TCE_ITEM WHERE A.ITEMID = ITEMPID) CNT FROM TCE_ITEM A WHERE A.OLDYN = 'N' START WITH (ITEMPID = 0) CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEMID = ITEMPID ORDER SIBLINGS BY orderby ) B WHERE ITEMNAME LIKE '%' || #str# || '%'

SELECT ITEMID, ITEMPID, LVL, NAME, ENAME, USEFLAG, PRICE, BASICCOND, BASICUNIT, BASICCNT, CALCBASE, ADDPRICE, ETC, REGID, REGDATE, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE, OLDYN, ORDERBY, OLDID FROM TCE_ITEM WHERE ITEMPID = #itemID# AND OLDYN = 'N'

SELECT C.TREEPRE, CASE WHEN C.LEAFS = '1' THEN C.TREEPRE || '_' || C.MTITEMID WHEN C.LEAFS = '0' THEN C.TREEPRE END AS TREE, C.LEAFS, C.MTITEMID, C.MASTERID, C.ITEMID, C.METHODID, C.TEMPERCOND, C.TEMPUNIT, C.TIMECOND, C.TIMECONDUNIT, C.ETC, C.ETCUNIT, C.LVL, C.RESULTFLAG, C.CONDID, C.UNITID, C.DISPLAYTYPE, C.PRICE, C.NAME, C.ENAME, C.ITEMPID, G.ADMIN FROM (SELECT SUBSTR(sys_connect_by_path(ITEMID, '.'), 2) TREEPRE, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF LEAFS, MTITEMID, MASTERID, ITEMID, METHODID, TEMPERCOND, TEMPUNIT, TIMECOND, TIMECONDUNIT, ETC, ETCUNIT, LVL, RESULTFLAG, ITEMPID, CONDID, UNITID, DISPLAYTYPE, PRICE, NAME, ENAME FROM ( SELECT A.MTITEMID, A.MASTERID, A.ITEMID, A.METHODID, A.TEMPERCOND, A.TEMPUNIT, A.TIMECOND, A.TIMECONDUNIT, A.ETC, A.ETCUNIT, A.LVL, A.RESULTFLAG, A.ITEMPID, A.CONDID, (SELECT C.UNITID FROM TNE_ITEM_DETAIL C WHERE C.ITEMID = A.ITEMID AND C.METHODID = A.METHODID) UNITID, (SELECT C.DISPLAYTYPE FROM TNE_ITEM_DETAIL C WHERE C.ITEMID = A.ITEMID AND C.METHODID = A.METHODID) DISPLAYTYPE, B.PRICE, B.NAME, B.ENAME FROM TCE_MASTER_ITEM A, TCE_ITEM B WHERE A.ITEMID = B.ITEMID AND A.MASTERID = #masterID# AND B.OLDYN = 'N' ) START WITH (ITEMPID = 0) CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEMID = ITEMPID) C , TNE_ITEM_DETAIL D, (SELECT E.ITEMID, E.ITEMPID, E.METHODID, REPLACE(wm_concat(F.NAME), ',', ', ') AS ADMIN FROM TNE_ITEM_ADMIN E, TCT_ADMIN F WHERE E.ADMINID = F.ADMINID (+) GROUP BY E.ITEMID, E.METHODID, E.ITEMPID ) G WHERE C.ITEMID = D.ITEMID (+) AND C.ITEMPID = D.ITEMPID (+) AND C.METHODID = D.METHODID (+) AND C.ITEMID = G.ITEMID (+) AND C.ITEMPID = G.ITEMPID (+) AND C.METHODID = G.METHODID (+) ORDER BY TREE

SELECT A.ITEMID, A.ITEMPID, C.METHODID, C.NAME, B.UNITID FROM TCE_MASTER_ITEM A, TNE_ITEM_DETAIL B, TCE_METHOD C WHERE A.ITEMID = B.ITEMID AND B.METHODID = C.METHODID AND A.MASTERID = #masterID# AND B.USEFLAG = 'Y'

SELECT A.ITEMID, A.CONDID, A.TEMPERCOND || B.CODENAME || '/' || TIMECOND || C.CODENAME || '/' || ETC || D.CODENAME TESTCOND FROM TNE_CONDITION A, TCT_CODE_DETAIL B, TCT_CODE_DETAIL C, TCT_CODE_DETAIL D WHERE A.TEMPUNIT = B.CODEID (+) AND A.TIMECONDUNIT = C.CODEID (+) AND A.ETCUNIT = D.CODEID (+)

SELECT MTITEMID, MASTERID, ITEMID, ITEMPID, LVL, METHODID, CONDID, TEMPERCOND, TEMPUNIT, TIMECOND, TIMECONDUNIT, ETC, ETCUNIT, RESULTFLAG, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE, REGID, REGDATE FROM TCE_MASTER_ITEM WHERE ITEMID = #itemPID# AND MASTERID = #masterID#

SELECT A.ITEMID, A.ITEMPID, A.LVL, A.NAME, A.ENAME, A.USEFLAG, A.PRICE, A.BASICCOND, A.BASICUNIT, A.BASICCNT, A.CALCBASE, A.ADDPRICE, A.ETC, A.REGID, A.REGDATE, A.MODIFYID, A.MODIFYDATE, A.OLDYN, A.ORDERBY, A.OLDID FROM TCE_ITEM A WHERE A.ITEMID = #itemPID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TCE_MASTER_ITEM ( MTITEMID, MASTERID, ITEMID, METHODID, ITEMPID, LVL, RESULTFLAG, REGID, REGDATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_TCE_MASTER_ITEM.nextval, #masterID#, #itemID#, #methodID#, #itemPID#, #lvl#, #resultFlag#, #regID#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TCE_MASTER_ITEM A SET A.METHODID = #methodID#, A.CONDID = #condID#, A.TEMPERCOND = (SELECT B.TEMPERCOND FROM TNE_CONDITION B WHERE B.CONDID = #condID#), A.TEMPUNIT = (SELECT B.TEMPUNIT FROM TNE_CONDITION B WHERE B.CONDID = #condID#), A.TIMECOND = (SELECT B.TIMECOND FROM TNE_CONDITION B WHERE B.CONDID = #condID#), A.TIMECONDUNIT = (SELECT B.TIMECONDUNIT FROM TNE_CONDITION B WHERE B.CONDID = #condID#), A.ETC = (SELECT B.ETC FROM TNE_CONDITION B WHERE B.CONDID = #condID#), A.ETCUNIT = (SELECT B.ETCUNIT FROM TNE_CONDITION B WHERE B.CONDID = #condID#), A.MODIFYID = #modifyID#, A.MODIFYDATE = sysdate, A.ORDERBY = #orderBy# WHERE A.MTITEMID = #mtItemID#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM TCE_MASTER_ITEM WHERE MTITEMID IN ( SELECT MTITEMID FROM TCE_MASTER_ITEM WHERE MTITEMID = #mtItemID# UNION SELECT MTITEMID FROM ( SELECT * FROM TCE_MASTER_ITEM B WHERE MASTERID = #masterID# ) START WITH (ITEMPID = (SELECT ITEMID FROM TCE_MASTER_ITEM WHERE MTITEMID = #mtItemID#)) CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEMID = ITEMPID)
sqlMap.select: SELECT MTITEMID, MASTERID, ITEMID, ITEMPID, LVL, METHODID, CONDID, TEMPERCOND, TEMPUNIT, TIMECOND, TIMECONDUNIT, ETC, ETCUNIT, RESULTFLAG, MODIFYID, MODIFYDATE, REGID, REGDATE FROM TCE_MASTER_ITEM WHERE ITEMID = #itemID# AND ITEMPID = #itemPID# AND MASTERID = #masterID#

SELECT SUBSTR(sys_connect_by_path(A.NAME, ' ->'), 4) AS ITEMNAME, ITEMID, ITEMPID, PRICE, LVL, (SELECT COUNT(ITEMPID) FROM TCE_ITEM WHERE A.ITEMID = ITEMPID AND OLDYN = 'N') CNT FROM TCE_ITEM A WHERE A.OLDYN = 'N' START WITH (ITEMID = #itemID#) CONNECT BY PRIOR ITEMPID = ITEMID ORDER SIBLINGS BY orderby
sqlMap.update: MERGE INTO TCE_MASTER_ITEM A USING ( SELECT SUBSTR(sys_connect_by_path(A.NAME, ' ->'), 4) AS ITEMNAME, A.ITEMID, A.ITEMPID, A.LVL FROM TCE_ITEM A WHERE A.OLDYN = 'N' AND A.ITEMID != #itemID# START WITH (A.ITEMID = #itemID#) CONNECT BY PRIOR A.ITEMPID = A.ITEMID ORDER SIBLINGS BY orderby ) B ON ( A.ITEMID = B.ITEMID AND A.ITEMPID = B.ITEMPID AND A.MASTERID = #masterID# ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (A.MTITEMID, A.ITEMID, A.ITEMPID, A.LVL, A.MASTERID, A.RESULTFLAG, A.REGID, A.REGDATE) VALUES (SEQ_TCE_MASTER_ITEM.nextval, B.ITEMID, B.ITEMPID, B.LVL, #masterID#, 'Y', #regID#, sysdate)
